product_name: MILK MAKEUPBalmade Hydrating Tinted Lip Balm with Electrolytes
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackMilk Makeup Balmade Electrolyte Lip Balm is a clean tinted lip balm with electrolytes for long-lasting hydration, juicy shine, and plumper-looking lips.
details: DetailsBenefitsHydrating lip balm fueled by electrolytes gives long-lasting hydrationSmooth, non-sticky feelSheer splash of color + juicy shine7 refreshing flavors so there's one for every bagInstantly adds and retains moisture to revive dry, chapped lipsHelps lips look plumper, fuller, and smootherClinically tested to not irritate sensitive skinTravel-friendly, easy-to-use squeeze tube applicatorKey IngredientsElectrolyte-rich complex (zinc, copper, and magnesium) helps bring moisture back to dry lipsBanana juice helps retain hydrationCoconut + aloe extracts help visibly smooth + condition chapped lipsFormulated WithoutSiliconeGlutenParabensItem 2640025How To UseGently squeeze tube and swipe onto lips.Close cap tightly after use.Pro Tip: Layer over Cooling Water Jelly Tint and Lip + Cheek (sold separately) to dial up the color.IngredientsPolybutene, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Magnesium Aspartate, Zinc Gluconate, Copper Gluconate, Musa Paradisiaca (Banana) Fruit Juice, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Glycerin, Sodium Saccharin, Aqua/Water/Eau, Lactic Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Flavor (Aroma), Vanillin, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 7 (CI 15850), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140)Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Gently squeeze tube and swipe onto lips.Close cap tightly after use.Pro Tip: Layer over Cooling Water Jelly Tint and Lip + Cheek (sold separately) to dial up the color.

reviews.headline: Love It!
reviews.comments: I was so pleasantly surprised by this lip balm! It's very hydrating and keeps my lips soft all day!

reviews.headline: Gets pretty sticky
reviews.comments: Nice for a little while, good color, but over time becomes sticky.  Not worth the $ in my opinion.

reviews.headline: Great lip balm
reviews.comments: Very hydrating, works well in tandem with the Ole Henriksen balm

reviews.headline: The best!
reviews.comments: I bought the melon one and it's amazing. tastes great, just a hint of color, and very moisturizing.

reviews.headline: Smooth and smells great but not tinted
reviews.comments: Complimentary from milkmakeup I've been impressed with Milk Makeup products in the past and I was excited to get my hands on the Balmade Hydrating Tinted Lip Balm in Refresher. I was intrigued as I had never heard of a lip balm having electrolytes to assist with hydration. Basically, it has zinc, copper, and magnesium to help moisturize your lips. It also has banana juice, coconut, and aloe extracts meant to help keep your lips hydrated as well as smooth and condition them if they're chapped. The color I tried promised to be a bright pink and have a "raspberry rave flavor." I don't feel it has much of a tint at all which was a bit disappointing when I was expecting a hot pink. It is smooth going on, isn't tacky or sticky, and smells fruity which I loved. It doesn't have a taste which I am thankful for as I don't really like to taste my lip products! It gives a pretty and natural shine while enhancing my lips. The lip balm doesn't last very long and while my lips certainly didn't feel dry after using it, I am not going to say they felt excessively moisturized either. If you want a smooth lip gloss that isn't sticky and has minimal (if any) tint, this one is for you. While I didn't find it overly hydrating, it was nice and smooth to put on so I did find myself reaching for it quite often!

reviews.headline: I would 100% purchase this product again in all shades!!!
reviews.comments: I was gifted by milkmakeup their new electrolyte lip balm, and I LOVE!!! It's so hydrating, the shades are beautiful, and it gives you that healthy plump look. I like pairing this with a lip liner to create the most hydrating lip combo. 10 out of 10 would recommend to anybody and 100% will be purchasing more shades!

reviews.headline: Highly recommend
reviews.comments: This balm was gifted by milk makeup. I like the way that the balm made my lips feel. They felt really hydrated and the scent that I got was fruity. I got refresher. I recommend for anyone who is looking for a new lip product to try out.

reviews.headline: Your lips but better!
reviews.comments:
Your lips but better!!! Absolutely loooveüíÑ‚ú® very hydrating & plumps lips so nicely! I got the she shade "work out" is the perfect shade for all seasons! Not sticky at all! The perfect consistency. Love the "Electrolyte" addition!
gifted by Milk Makeup

reviews.headline: So glossy
reviews.comments: This was gifted by milk this is an amazing lip gloss and it smells like my child hood. This made me so happy when i applied it. This is also very shinny and looks amazing over any lipstick especially with a lip liner i love it

reviews.headline: Soft, hydrated lips with a natural glow
reviews.comments: Before trying this balm, my lips were often a little dry and lacked smoothness. After applying the Election scent, I noticed an immediate difference ‚Äî my lips looked plumper, smoother, and much more hydrated. The formula feels really light and non-sticky, which makes it comfortable to wear throughout the day without feeling heavy or greasy. What I especially like is how the hydration lasts for hours, even after talking, drinking, or being outside. The subtle fresh fragrance of Election makes the experience even more enjoyable ‚Äî it's noticeable but not overpowering. Overall, I'm really happy with how this balm performs. It not only gives instant relief but also leaves my lips soft and healthy-looking with a natural glow. This product was gifted by milkmakeup , but this review reflects my honest and personal experience.

reviews.headline: Lip balm with electrolytes!!!???
reviews.comments: This product is revolutionary and unlike any other lip balm on the market. A lip balm with electrolytes AND it tastes good!!! It's such a cool concept and leaves my lips feeling so hydrated, soft and looking shiny. I'm obsessed and can't stop using it! I got this sent to me for free but that doesn't change my opinion on this product. I would 100% spend my own money repurchasing this or trying a different color/flavor. I was gifted by milkmakeup.

reviews.headline: nourishing
reviews.comments: This lip balm glides on effortlessly, feeling deeply nourishing without any stickiness. Unlike others that need constant reapplication, this one keeps my lips hydrated for hours. It also adds a beautiful, subtle tint that enhances my natural lip color! It's complimentary from milk makeup

reviews.headline: OMG SO GOOD
reviews.comments: This is the first Milk lippie that I've ever tried, and I cannot love it anymore than I do! It smells so incredible, and it's not like a faint scent either, I can smell it on my lips all day. It's like a raspberry/strawberry scent and might be my new favorite scent ever! My lips feel so great with this balm on, and now I want every shade and flavor! Gifted by Milk Makeup

reviews.headline: Perfect Hydration with a Pop of Color
reviews.comments:
'm honestly obsessed with Milk Makeup's Balmade Lip Balm in the shade ION. The formula is buttery smooth and feels instantly nourishing without being heavy or sticky. The shade ION is the perfect soft berry tint, subtle enough for everyday wear but still gives my lips a healthy, polished look. I love that it's buildable; one swipe is sheer, but a couple more gives a richer pop of color. It's packed with natural oils that keep my lips hydrated for hours, and I notice less flakiness even on colder days. The packaging is sleek and easy to toss in my bag, making it perfect for on-the-go touch-ups. A great blend of care and color!
*Gifted by Milkmakeup*

reviews.headline: Great color and smell!
reviews.comments: I was so excited to receive this complimentary from milkmakeup lip balm! Upon opening the package,  was pleasantly surprised with the size and how much product there was. I like that the gloss has a slight tint, accentuating my natural lip color without looking unnatural. I LOVE the smell.

reviews.headline: Feels like a lip treatment
reviews.comments: I got the shade Ion and the white peach scent is so good. It's light and not too sweet. The texture feels super smooth when you apply it and it gives a soft glossy tint, doesn't feel sticky. My lips felt instantly hydrated and stayed soft for hours. It also made them look a little more plump and healthy. It gives light tint and feels like a lip treatment. Gifted by milkmakeup

reviews.headline: Obsessed with This Hydrating Balm
reviews.comments: I received the Balmade Lip Balm in Juiced, complimentary from @milkmakeup, and I'm obsessed! It glides on so smoothly, hydrates instantly, and the fruity scent is refreshing. My lips felt soft and looked healthier right away. It's glossy but not sticky, and super comfy for everyday wear. Definitely keeping this one close!

reviews.headline: My new fav lip balm!
reviews.comments: My new fav lip balm! Werk Out is gorgeous, smells amazing, and keeps my lips hydrated for hours. It's lightweight, soothing, and I've worn it nonstop since receiving it complimentary from Milk Makeup!

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: Gifted by Milk Cosmetics - I've tried a lot of balms, but MEET BALMADE actually delivers. It hydrates deeply (thanks, electrolytes!) and the moisture lasts‚Äîno constant reapplying. I love the smooth texture, natural tint, and fun flavors. WERK OUT is my current fave‚Äîperfect dusty rose with a juicy melon vibe. Bonus: my lips look healthier and a little plumper. Clean, effective, and not just hype. I'm hooked.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again, I loved it!
reviews.comments: I'm in love with gifted by Milk Makeup! Super moisturizing and buttery texture, non-sticky and provides a natural glow. Clean, vegan, and perfect for everyday use! The packaging is super cute and minimal.

faceoff_positive.comments: Complimentary from milkmakeup I've been impressed with Milk Makeup products in the past and I was excited to get my hands on the Balmade Hydrating Tinted Lip Balm in Refresher. I was intrigued as I had never heard of a lip balm having electrolytes to assist with hydration. Basically, it has zinc, copper, and magnesium to help moisturize your lips. It also has banana juice, coconut, and aloe extracts meant to help keep your lips hydrated as well as smooth and condition them if they're chapped. The color I tried promised to be a bright pink and have a "raspberry rave flavor." I don't feel it has much of a tint at all which was a bit disappointing when I was expecting a hot pink. It is smooth going on, isn't tacky or sticky, and smells fruity which I loved. It doesn't have a taste which I am thankful for as I don't really like to taste my lip products! It gives a pretty and natural shine while enhancing my lips. The lip balm doesn't last very long and while my lips certainly didn't feel dry after using it, I am not going to say they felt excessively moisturized either. If you want a smooth lip gloss that isn't sticky and has minimal (if any) tint, this one is for you. While I didn't find it overly hydrating, it was nice and smooth to put on so I did find myself reaching for it quite often!
faceoff_positive.headline: Smooth and smells great but not tinted

faceoff_negative.comments:
So I work as an employee and was really excited to try this out. I saw that Milk was 5x the points and immediately bought it, I had high hopes for its innovative marketing for "electrolyte" lip products but unfortunately it didnt do much for my lips. I adore my Laneige, & my Ole & even quite a fan of Lanolips. But this here felt really pointless. 
Upon application, it made me feel the texture of my slightly dry lips. I waited a little for maybe some hydration that'll feel a little better but even after about 4 minutes, it still felt really thin and pointless.

Color/tint was pretty, I got the dusty rose colored one. 

I feel strongly that this could be used on top of gloss/lipstick or something! But I have too many dusty pinks to keep this product.

This is coming from someone who has to go on a "no lip purchase" punishment pretty often üò≠üò≠üò≠üò≠
faceoff_negative.headline: Ehhhh, maybe for the color?
